scripts.build: rimraf ./dist && cd back && yarn prestart:back:prod && cd ../front && yarn prestart:front:prod
scripts.lint: yarn s lint && cd front && yarn lint:style
scripts.types: tcm front && tsc --noEmit -p front && tsc --noEmit -p back

hooks.pre-commit: yarn soda lint-staged && yarn types && yarn circular && cd front && yarn lint:style
